me.kinomoto.proteam.elements

Class AbstractOpticalElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.AbstractOpticalElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mirror, Prism

    public abstract class AbstractOpticalElement
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractOplitalElement abstract class is representing general properties of Mirror and Prism an implementation of beam collision with the object detection
